website_summaries.verdict: A large sturdy tote made of recycled materials and available in several colors.
pros: The eco-friendly tote features long straps that can be adjusted for multiple carrying options
The main compartment and interior pocket both snap closed
The large tote is very roomy and features a good looking minimalist design
cons: Color fades quickly in high wear areas

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag ! I love how easy it is to change the strap because sometimes I want to wear it on one shoulder and others times i like to wear it across my chest!! I also hold it with the smaller straps sometimes, I just love this bag. It is so fashionable, i am constantly getting compliments, it holds so much, i love the little pouch inside as well. I HIGHLY recommend this bag! (Here's a pic of me wearing it across my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Go-to bag
customer_reviews.text: It's become my go-to bag. Fits my laptop easily; seems super sturdy and remarkably doesn't pick up much dirt, even when left on the ground. If possible, get the 2018 version of your preferred design, they have a zippered internal pocket instead of a snap-pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kangourou

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description.. Not the duck bag of the past >:(!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me first start by sharing that the duck bag by baggu is my all time favorite bag - it’s bizarre depth and interesting proportions make it the best carry all for a creative or a weirdo. It’s a little awkward to adjust to at first but it ends up saving you on more than one occasion. That being said, this is a truly lame re-design! They’ve evened out the proportions and kicked some of the features that once made it the best. The inner pocket no longer snaps but instead zips - it feels like paper in your hands. The straps are thinner. Yuck. Returned. Buy the old style through customer service, you don’t want this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jetpack

customer_reviews.title: Great for files
customer_reviews.text: I’m a social worker and have to carry lots of papers to different homes. I can fit my binder, storage clipboard, and a few file folders and still comfortably snap the button overtop. The inside pocket is also large enough to fit my phone, charger, a few pens, and my keys. I haven’t washed it yet but it’s a thick and sturdy material, so I’m confident it will be just fine. Great alternative to a stuffy briefcase. A+
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight canvas beach tote
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Heavy weight canvas. Easily adjustable to cross body or shoulder length straps. Arrival time as promised. Purchased for beach holiday. Comfortably fits towel, swimsuit, book and sunglasses. Inside zipper pocket large enough for phone, sunscreen, lip balm. Snaps on sides at the top allow for a cute bucket bag look when it's not too full of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday tote
customer_reviews.text: Perfect everyday tote. The canvas is thicker than other canvas bags I’ve had and you can set it down and it still stands upright. No surprises really, it is just as advertised. Super cute and much cheaper than my previous totes (Longchamp bags which cost over $150). Also love that the bag is washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The moment I opened the box, I fell in love with this bag. I do agree with previous reviews about a bottom lining on the bag — it would be better if there was one. Either way, I’m super happy with my purchase and will most likely but another color. It’s not a bright yellow, sort of mustardy and it’s beautiful. I’ve been wanting for a yellow tote for the longest time and couldn’t be any happier with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: miener

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, but make sure you don't want to return
customer_reviews.text: Bag itself was nice, but I ended up returning and the options were to take it to an (inconveniently located) Amazon drop off location for free or pay for return shipping. If you're on the fence, just know you could be on the hook for $7+ for the return shipping if it doesn't work out, something that isn't obvious in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kregel

customer_reviews.title: I love that the handles are short
customer_reviews.text: I love that the handles are short. It's easier to carry heavy objects, with a longer handle it pulls on one's shoulder. I only wish the bottom of the bag was reinforced with something to protect the bag when it is on the floor. (I ride nyc subway). I also wsh the shoulder strap was removable as I don use it. Gave one to my co-worker as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: Why haven't you ordered this yet?!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this bag is amazing. Great size, very well made, and more features than I thought was possible on a canvas bag. Little things like the inside pocket and the two sets of buttons that keep the bag closed depending on whether you're using the long strap or the short strap make it a really great bag to carry. I ordered the black so it's classic and will never feel out of style, but I can easily see myself ordering more colors because it's just that cool.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Salemka

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction but beware the black canvas attracts every single piece of lint it comes into contact with.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaJ

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: at first glance the bag did not look quite as big as it did in the picture, but after using the bag a little bit this thing is huge! It is awesome for everyday wear and super convenient if I go to the grocery store for a few things and forget to bring my reusable shopping bags! I will be traveling a lot in the next few months and im super excited to bring this bag along as itll make the perfect carryon/personal item for plane travel and just comfy to walk around with in general!
customer_reviews.author: Rima

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fashionable, useful bag that is gender neutral
customer_reviews.text: I first got my husband a BAGGU canvas bag years ago and he loved it so much it eventually faded and wore through. I think it took about six years for this to happen. This new, updated version has him happy again, especially because it has a zipper that wasn't featured before. He enjoys using it so much, I'm considering getting my own.
customer_reviews.author: violetcherry

customer_reviews.title: Versatile bag!
customer_reviews.text: Im a mom, and a researcher. This bag goes from office, classroom and conference to the playground or beach. It's truly fantastic. It fits a laptop, water bottle, notebook, or a little diaper essential, water , change of clothes and snacks for the kids. I own it on two colors, and I've also got the baggu weekend model. Fyi, it also fits a Spectra pump with a small cooler! It's so versatalie, easy to care for, and looks good after a wash .
customer_reviews.author: Dr_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling to beach
customer_reviews.text: I love bags, and had my eye on this one for a while. I finally pulled the trigger and asked for it as a birthday gift right before a girl's trip to the beach. This was perfect as an airplane carry on, a "walk around town" bag, and a beach bag. I was able to fit my water bottle, turkish towel, wallet, sunglasses, sunscreen and still had room left for souvenirs and such.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but all the contents get lumped in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute bag and the quality seems nice. Because of the deep rectangular shape, the contents tend to all settle at the bottom of the bag, making it uncomfortable to carry around unless you don't put much in there. I carry a ton of stuff with me so if you are like me, the balance of this bag is not optimal. If the bag had pockets sewn into the sides and some items could be stored there, it might balance it better and make it less uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura I.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag because I saw all the good reviews, and I specifically wanted a work bag that was taller so I could fit my laptop in (my wide mouth bag just gapes with the laptop). My current work bag is shorter but has a wider opening, and I end up feeling like I'm hauling a nappy bag around. So, I wanted something a bit more stylish. So far this is great, it fits everything nicely, is comfortable to wear, and I like that it has two handle options - the short one or the longer one. The only thing I'm not enjoying is that the black colour picks up fluff like nobody's business!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional and just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It’s super cute and the perfect size for taking back and forth to work each day. I am able to throw my crossbody in there, my iPad, lunch and water bottle (along with other odds and ends) and Carr it with no problem. It doesn’t bother me that it doesn’t stand up... but just know, it doesn’t. I plan to get a couple others in different colors. Once my tiny human is a little bigger and requires less stuff, I’m sure I’ll also use this as a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I was looking for a tote for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was looking for a tote for college and stumbled across this one. Most of the reviews were from people using this as an everyday bag, so at first I was a little skeptical to use it for my school supplies. Turns out, it works amazingly! It’s so small & compact that you wouldn’t think it would be able to hold a MacBook, some textbooks, my water bottle, wallet, makeup, and pens. But this little thing has so much room and is incredibly sturdy! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me...and probably for you, too.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this bag in a magazine as one the featured person's "favorite" things. I was in the market for a carry-all so I ordered it. I LOVE it so much that I am ordering one for each of my best girlfriends as gifts. It is seriously the perfect size; deep enough, wide enough (magazines & legal tablets fit nicely) and has a handy pocket with a snap. My favorite feature is that it can be carried across the body, over the shoulder or by the handles. The fabric is durable but not too heavy and the price is just right. I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: R. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. This is actually my 3rd one. Sturdy, holds as little or as much as you need. Flexibility in how you can carry it and super comfortable to wear across body. I walk a lot and this bag holds everything I need in an entire day with multiple kids. By far my favorite bag ever. And also love my Baggu grocery bags. Never leave the house without them.
customer_reviews.author: GAMamaw

customer_reviews.title: Washable, sturdy and I own about a dozen.
customer_reviews.text: Baggu makes the most amazing bags and purses, and this is only of my favorite styles of theirs. It has a small pocket inside that zips closed. Perfect for travel; my phone, passport, wallet, change, keys and lip balm fit easily in the small inner pocket and the snap top helps hold in whatever else you cram in there. The adjustable strap means it could be either a shoulder bag or a cross body bag, again, perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ro R

customer_reviews.title: But it actually looks really good! I love the slouch the bag gives
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure if this bag would look big on me since I'm 5'1, petite frame. But it actually looks really good! I love the slouch the bag gives. It hugs my body well. It's the perfect everyday bag and I also use it as my diaper bag. I'm planning to use it on my next plane ride as my carry on. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the stitching on one side is lop sided, instead of a straight precise line. But other than that, the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kat N

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, as pictured. Great inside pocket. SO happy I replaced my ugly utility bag with this. The bag is perfect for carrying my 13" laptop with case.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good capacity, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love these cross body totes! I have the chestnut that I bought from Amazon three years ago and I still use it daily! After years of use, it has two small holes in the bottom from the corners of textbooks from when I was in college and it still works great. They hold so much that I went from using it for college, to using it as a diaper bag, to my every day bag/purse, and now it goes back and forth with me to my various jobs. After 3 years people STILL compliment me on this bag all the time! I just ordered the mushroom color and can’t wait for it to come.
customer_reviews.author: Devon mott

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one in a boutique! Delighted I could find it on amazon! The one I bought is fine but keeping some art things in for my art class. I ordered another one to take on trips, farmers markets and multi uses. It’s very strong and has a small zipper pocket! Plan to order some as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Handy, well-made bag with plenty of room for daily needs
customer_reviews.text: I love BAGGU! This bag is great for traveling to and from work – holds everything I need for the day like my laptop, chargers, notebooks, day planner, lunch etc. The adjustable strap is key. Easy to roll up and travel with and machine washable for when I spill coffee on it (whoops)
customer_reviews.author: Gab Bonghi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crossbody tote bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bag that is a little bigger than my compact purse but smaller than my backpack. I’m in that season where I need to carry some items for my kids (water bottles, snacks, wipes) but don’t need a full diaper bag/backpack. The Baggu tote is very well made and if it’s like my other Baggu bags it should hold up well for many years to come. The canvas is thicker than most simple totes and I like that the long strap can be fitted to wear the bag crossbody style. Great bag for a great price! Would definitely recommend this over other simple canvas totes.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tote!
customer_reviews.text: I got this tote for my husband who kept stealing mine and complaining they were flimsy when he would overload them with stuff. This one is made of sturdy, thick canvas, with quality stitching. It has a zippered pocket on the inside, which is great for keys/wallet/etc. It snaps closed, and the strap extends long enough to wear cross-body. I want one for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Feldman

customer_reviews.title: This bag was great, and I've continued to use it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a trip to Europe since I wanted a cross body that was big enough for a camera and guidebook. This bag was great, and I've continued to use it as a casual weekend bag. You can wear it as a cross body or carry it by the two smaller handles. It holds a lot of stuff and can handle a good amount of weight inside, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: My friend had this bag, and after borrowing it for something, I knew I had to get my own. It's durable, cute, and hold everything I need it to for work or stopping to do errands on my way home from work. Definitely a great addition to my wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: PCB

customer_reviews.title: Poor availability of colors.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is better than the free totes from your favorite charity or conference. Unfortunately, color availability is limited. I really wanted chestnut. Canyon has a definite pink tone.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberjoe

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: SO much room. Cute. Wish the strap was longer but it’s better than I thought. There is only one smaller zipped compartment on the inside but it’s big enough to put valuables so they feel more enclosed since the bag only has a snap button to close.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great All-In-One!
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability of this bag. I’m constantly switching purses to fit my “stuff” but have finally found something to handle it all. It’s deep enough to hold my 13” Mac, 40 ounce water bottle, and planner plus has an inside pocket to keep my keys and phone from being lost. On the weekends, it turns into the diaper and toy carryall for my little. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Mauch

customer_reviews.title: Take it on a trip- great carry on, beach tote and overnight bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is reasonably priced, casual, useful, multi-purpose, high quality and even- fashionable?! It's an excellent overnight bag or beach tote. The material is durable and easy to clean. The inside pocket is just big enough for your phone or other small items. Even the pattern is zippy, on trend with the resurgence of 90s style, and I received several compliments while vacationing in Miami beach! I can't wait to take it on another trip.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has nice, thick canvas that feels very sturdy and like it will last me for years ahead. The places where the handles meet the bag are extremely well-sewn and durable, and so I feel confident that even my 20 lb. bag contents (art supplies!) will stay secure in the bag without me having to fear for the handles ripping off. I think I'll stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Long But Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but more narrow than I thought. I should have checked the dimensions more carefully. It seems awfully narrow and long for a tote. I’m sure I’ll find a use for it, but was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelly

customer_reviews.title: In love!! I even added a cute little gold ...
customer_reviews.text: In love!! I even added a cute little gold angel pin 💓 the bag is extremely sturdy and made really well.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca M

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, awful smell
customer_reviews.text: This bag looked just like the other BAGGUs I’ve seen. But it smells terrible. It has been soaked in insecticide or fungicide. I’ve washed it and hang it outside for a week but it still reeks.
customer_reviews.author: KMA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as the kid's bag when we go out and about - I love the durability of the canvas like material, the classic look of the blue stripes and the two handle options. It's super versatile and I've received so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Redwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: SO handy. I have plenty of tote bags, but I started using this immediately and haven’t stopped.
customer_reviews.author: S. Potter

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love canvas bags in general, but this one is by far my favorite! It’s super functional as a purse or grocery tote with a pocket for keys or phone.
customer_reviews.author: shmesbian

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I bought it in the plain cream canvas. It is a great size, nice thick canvas, and the adjustable cross body strap is the best. I have the smaller handles tucked back in and will probably always use it that way. I bought it for an upcoming trip to Europe but it has quickly become my most practical and cute everyday bag. And I can throw it in the wash when it gets dirty. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great look, but not crossbody.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and still of this tote. My only here is that I wish the long strap was really a crossbody strap.... Then I'd give five stars! Might be crossbody on a child or very petite woman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer571

customer_reviews.title: My go-to bag...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2! Love love this bag! The canvas is thick and I love the size and depth. I had to get one as a present for a relative who is a college student. It'll come in handy for books. I use this bag for everything- Baby stuff to run out of the house really quick, an everyday bag to hold all of my junk, and I even use it as a laptop bag. This takes me to review the one with the laptop padded pocket. I bought the navy polka dot one, too! Don't love that one as much as this one. The stripe one's canvas is thicker and I love stripes so it's cuter in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag! I'm a flight attendant and this is the perfect bag to use for exploring different cities on my layovers. Great size, cross body, and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: C. Horton

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I get compliments on it all the time. I love the shape too, but I threw it in the wash after a coffee accident and it didn't keep it's shape. It's also really durable. I put tons of stuff in there and never worry about the strap ripping. I love that it converts too. The handle bag is just too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ak92

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Bag
customer_reviews.text: I like a canvas bag for daily use as I tote glasses, water bottle and small purchases. This bag is perfect, lots of space, options for ways of carrying the bag and it's stylish. I also plan on using it as a beach tote.
customer_reviews.author: kamagain

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag!! I bought this to use as a beach bag for a cruise, but also wanted something I could use during the summer as a regular bag/tote. This was perfect!! The strap is adjustable and at full length works perfectly as a cross-body bag. The only issue I had was that after a week the blue stripes seem slightly faded in places, but it almost gives it "character" in a good way. The little pocket inside is perfect for tucking in a wallet or anything you want quick access to. Perfect purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bag!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged to take this bag back to CA after visiting me in Washington. I am bereft, but will order another one! We both thought, in addition to all the durability factors, it's a GREAT LOOKING tote! (Now we just need to buy a boat to go with it!)
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is so durable and constructed so well, amazing for a transport tote. I have already traveled with this beauty across the country 4 times and it has held up well. Can’t recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Centurion

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag made of strong and durable fabric. Perfect size for an overnight bag that includes fitting and extra pair of shoes in. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Most durable tote bag ever ! And holds alot ! I often use it as an overnight bag
customer_reviews.author: Mochi10

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. Such classic retro colors and design and sturdy quality construction! The canvas is thick and can support books and beachware. I even use it for schlepping groceries from the store or farmer's market. Certainly recommend this to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work/travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I originally got the same bag in Navy stripes in a Popsugar Must Have box and used until it died and this one is even better~. The rust color is wonderful! Not a neutral but not crazy bright either. Plan on using this one until it, or I, wears out
customer_reviews.author: SoExasperating

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tote for longer days
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag - the adjustable strap is awesome so I can switch up how I carry it throughout the day and it's roomy enough to use for everything. I like that there's not separate compartments on the inside (one zippered pocket which is nice for valuables), but the wide open interior space makes it perfect for bulkier items
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Blair

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag!
customer_reviews.text: It came in as expected, looks the same as in description, very comfortable and durable as far as I can tell. Absolutely love the mustard one. Might buy one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote Weekend Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of BAGGU ever since my sister introduced them to me! I especially luv this tote...use it every weekend, goes with cute on the go outfits, durable, holds other shopping bags inside, two handle versions. I wish they would bring back the "leopard" print version.
customer_reviews.author: MindyN

customer_reviews.title: I bought the black duck bag and it attracts lint like crazy. The small handles
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bag for one day. It is smaller than I expected. I bought the black duck bag and it attracts lint like crazy. The small handles, I feel, get in the way of trying to get things in and out of the bag. Otherwise, it looks like it's going to be pretty durable. The fabric looks like it can withstand a lot, even though it's pretty lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this bag while in NYC, and had to order it! Holds a ton of stuff, while still looking cute! Perfect for laptop and sketching pads!! Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Julia L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag, will buy another!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Super durable and perfect for biking or commuting
customer_reviews.author: Britney Gaustad

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyday use but DON'T get black color
customer_reviews.text: Good for everyday use but DON'T get black color. It catches dusts a lot. I mean a LOOOOT. I carried it for an hour and white dusts were all over the bag. Try to get lighter colored ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sj837728

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cream canvas color as an everyday tote, and LOVE IT! It is very sturdy-I can carry a full bag of groceries and not have to worry about it breaking. I always get compliments on it. It matches my bohemian and laid back style and can carry a lot without looking too bulky. 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bag ever! I saw it on display at a small stationary store and knew I had to buy it. It seems very sturdy and the color (Canyon) is very true to photo. Inside there is a pocket with a zipper that can fit all my smaller and more important items so I don’t need to rummage through my bag—keys, wallet, candy, etc. I really love this bag. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christy D

customer_reviews.title: Better in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed really thin in person and not as cute.
customer_reviews.author: shoecrazy

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my sister-in-law who loves tote bags -- she loves it and it looks adorable! No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLove

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It holds so much, stays on my shoulder. Strap is not long enough for cross body all the time, but is long enough when you need to wrangle your kid and something else and don't want it in the way. Holds my stuff, laptop, and diapers.
customer_reviews.author: AlexBC

customer_reviews.title: good bag
customer_reviews.text: great bag, keep it in my trunk with extra work clothes and books
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Am headed to Brimfield (massive flea market) and this will be perfect to tote about!
customer_reviews.author: The DuRochers

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever.
customer_reviews.text: It's my new favorite bag. It's durable and roomy. I regularly carry a water bottle , a hardcover book, all of my day to day (keys,cellphone, lotion, lip balm) sketch pad and pencil case. I can toss in a cardigan with room to spare as well. The strap extends and it works well as a crossbody bag. I probably buy a few more of these in different colors. Fabulous buy.
customer_reviews.author: MissGnomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for literally everything. It’s so comfortable and functional. I receive a lot of compliments on it as well. Will definitely be purchasing baggu products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Galloping Gerdie

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome. It's sturdy and big enough for all of ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. It's sturdy and big enough for all of my daily stuffs. The adjustable strap is really handy as well. I'm overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Rendulic

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I have washed mine a few times and it is holding up nice. I put it away for winter but I will use it next Spring/Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Leah French

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' My Duck Bag
customer_reviews.text: My job requires me to travel, and I am always toting some smaller items that I don't want to throw in boxes with other materials. While I have oodles of bags, I wanted something sturdy and reliable. BAGGU accommodates my needs and makes me happy. It is a convenient size, not too big, not too small, and thoroughly strong. Lovin' it!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Bagu is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, I have several of their different bags, I use and love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Perfect for what I used it for and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dbs

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Roomy Knitting Project Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was exactly what I have been looking for!!! It’s sturdy, roomy and a great value for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Bretl

customer_reviews.title: but overall a really nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for my dance classes and it holds my dance shoes, dance attire, journal and bottle of water. As other reviewers have mentioned this bag is deep, so some times I have trouble finding my house keys, but overall a really nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: lizette santana

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, holds lots!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color ochre and one in lilac. It is a big, deep bag with a zipper inside pocket
customer_reviews.author: P. Sennett

customer_reviews.title: The bags are a good size with an interior pocket
customer_reviews.text: The photo makes these bags look more substantial than they are. The bags are a good size with an interior pocket. But, I was hoping to monogram the two I bought for gifts and hoped for more heft but they're like a flea market quality...maybe not gift-able. Like 1 reviewer said an expensive grocery bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Photo does not match
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the website for “natural” does not match the item I got (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: I love this versatile bag
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as pictured/described. I love this versatile bag. I will be using it for several things, such as groceries, picnics, lunch bag, personal item on flights, book bag, etc. The material is very thick and durable and I love the navy color :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great tote bag for work!
customer_reviews.text: Use this bag to carry my shoes to work. Works great. Stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Strong bag
customer_reviews.text: Looks a little bit ugly, but holds everything. Really versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Rosteles

customer_reviews.title: 5 star travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bag. Wish it zipped closed. Held all sorts of stuff like cameras, souveniers, sweaters, water bottles, cookies, and even a bottle of wine. Very sturdy! Just what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice bag, quite spacious too, my only complaint is that the fabric gets dirty very easily and everything gets attached to it. I have to clean it pretty often. I use a lint roller to get all the fluff off and keep it looking descent.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great for runs to the farmers market, the mall or just lugging around many items! Looks great super slouchy or super full. So nice that I can just empty it out and throw it in the wash as well.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Smith

customer_reviews.title: it’s pretty good
customer_reviews.text: good bag, wish i got a different color because the black one is absolutely impossible to find things in. the shape of it makes it harder
customer_reviews.author: Grace Levert

customer_reviews.title: Ink might run
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed about it. It looks like the ink has rubbed and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J Nava

customer_reviews.title: Perfect NYC bag
customer_reviews.text: Love love this bag. I can fit so much in plus make it a crossbody if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: love!!
customer_reviews.text: love this bag! it is super cute and sturdy with plenty of room for whatever you will need for the day. there is even a handy interior zipper pocket for keeping important things like keys or your wallet easy to reach!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: My Everyday Tote I Don't have to Stress About
customer_reviews.text: Durable, Washable and worry free! Love this for navigating the city.
customer_reviews.author: Sglipari

customer_reviews.title: A SIMPLE GOOD BAG.
customer_reviews.text: IT IS SIMPLY MADE, LIGHTWEIGHT, HAS THE LONG OVER THE SHOULDER STRAP THAT IS FINE FOR ME AS I HAVE TO WALK WITH TWO TREKING POLES. LANDS END AND LL BEAN HAVE BETTER CANVAS BAGS OF ALL SORTS BUT THEY DO NOT HAVE THE LONG OVER THE HEAD SHOULDER STRAPS.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Berke

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bag! It's big and very roomy, I was afraid at first because I ordered the beige, then I saw a review that it come's out bright orange WHICH WAS A LIE BECAUSE ITS A PERFECT COLOR ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good material
customer_reviews.text: The canvas of this bag is thick and very durable. I have been carrying it for a couple weeks now and cram it full of books, kids toys, etc and it has held up well. I also love that if it gets dirty I can throw it in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great summer bag. Love that I can transform from shoulder bag to crossbody.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great shopping bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day instead of a "regular" purse. It's especially roomy - great for a shopping bag. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: In the winter I send my kids to school with this bag for their snow pants and shoes. The bag is the perfect size and the long handle is a must. I embroidered them and they looked great.
customer_reviews.author: shopper J

customer_reviews.title: Fawn color different
customer_reviews.text: Fawn color was darker/tanner in person. Still relatively neutral, but not as versatile color
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great Knitting Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great knitting bag! It easily fits two projects and my iPad. I love that I can carry it by the handle or sling it on my shoulder. I use this bag for beach knitting (sans the iPad). It always looks nice and washes up like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
